Keywords: Celebrity , S.W.O.R.D.
Real Name: Monica Rambeau
Special Powers
WANDA, PLEASE LISTEN TO ME: POWER: Choose an opposing character within range and line of fire. Until your next turn, Monica Rambeau gains Immobile, and when the chosen character attacks, it can only target a character named Monica Rambeau.
I HAVE TO TRY AND HELP HER: STOP. Super Senses.

Comments
June 9, 2022
Disasstah
I think she's going to pair well with pieces that can pull tokens off her. Not to mention you can hide her behind barrier or your team and that whomever she targeted can now only attack her. Lots of folks complaining about Thanos right now, and I see no reason why this figure can't lock him down a bit. She's a good piece but not great and requires finesse.
May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
People are saying this piece is garbage? I don't understand people. 25 points for Shape Change + Super Senses + a STOP Click where she keeps both. Don't even bring the SHIELD TA or her special attack power into the discussion, that's already worth it. Run her up to a ranged piece twice her cost--which, again, means it only has to be 50 points--and keep them occupied a few turns, you're coming out ahead. Then you use the Attack special to keep a [I]different[/I] opposing piece busy--ideally a close-combat piece that's based by a different friendly, and can't make ranged attacks out of adjacency. Then get one of the several PC pieces in this set to reroll the opposing breakaway rolls? She's not a centerpiece, like the Empyre version, but she's a lockdown master for her cost and a heck of a team player. Five stars.
May 7, 2022
tyroclix
I have heard from a few people that this piece is anything but hot garbage. 4 range, LoF and a Power action really limits the possibilities. How often is anyone going to TK her out and Power to slow a main attacker? 2 actions of your 3 to stop an attack. And honestly, if the perfect scenario appears, just outwit the power and voila.
May 2, 2022
Goop
So for 25pts you can bring a lot of misery to your opponent if the dice are rolling in your favor. Forcing their biggest gun to waste attacks into your Super Sense/Shape Change character can be a real pain. You can take big guys totally out of the game, however honestly its a lot easier to just use any number of other tie up pieces.
